programme.title: Baseball and politics in 1988
programme.short_synopsis: Do the baseball metaphors of the 1988 presidential candidates endear them to the public?
programme.medium_synopsis: With the 1988 presidential race and World Series drawing to a close, Alistair Cooke looks at the baseball metaphors used by George H W Bush and Michael Dukakis in their campaigns.

display_title.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
display_title.subtitle: Baseball and politics in 1988

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
